jobInfo.postDescription:
•	Define, execute and document manual and automatic verification tests for new products.
•	Fully participate in the product lifecycle for Molecular Device market-leading colony picker, plater reader products to offer competitive product quality to our customers. 
•	Use agile development tools and methodologies within a lean software development process.
•	Work with cross-functional teams to ensure the product meets the requirements for quality, stability, reliability and regulatory demands and manufacturing.
•	Collaborate with global teams to drive synergies across common software test tools and strategies.
•	Ensure the compliance with the professional code, company policies and regulations. 
•	Lead the reliability test for both hardware and software. 
•	Collaborate with system engineer to define verification plan and software test plan. 
•	Work with software engineer or technical support to reproduce and debug issues in existing products.
•	Occasional customer / site visits & training
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区浦东新区圆通路128号东方智谷

brandComInfo.introduce:
关于我们

美迪希实验仪器(上海)有限公司隶属于Danaher集团，是一家拥有30年创新及市场领先历史的公司，于1983年在美国硅谷成立，于1987年推出其第一台微孔板读板机。自此，美迪希通过其不懈的研发与合作，不断拓展其在生物分析检测系统中的解决方案。其产品覆盖微孔板检测分析、高通量筛选、高内涵成像、高效克隆筛选等。公司以持续创新、快速高效、一流质量的产品及完善的售后服务著称业内。

美迪希总部位于美国硅谷中心圣何塞市,在上海，圣何塞，萨尔斯堡分别设有工厂，并在全球设有分公司，包括美国、法国、英国、德国、中国、韩国、日本、巴西、加拿大、奥地利，新加坡等11个国家的14个地区。全球员工近1100人，年营业额为3.5亿美金。

丹纳赫是全球科学和技术的创新者，致力于帮助我们的客户在全球各地应对复杂的挑战和改善生活品质。我们在前沿和富有吸引力的领域拥有众多世界一流的品牌。丹纳赫位列美国财富500强。
